data.actual_result: There isn't any spacing between the name and timestamp (Example: " KirBoat™Today at 21:03")
data.expected_result: There is a dash (or at the very least a space) between the username and timestamp like there was before
data.short_description: When copying a username/timestamp the dash between the username and timestamp is missing
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a username and the timestamp (See screenshot) - Copy it - Paste it anywhere
